definition: to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward

pinyin: Jia1 li4 lu:e4 tan4 ce4 qi4
ban4 dao3 ti3 tan4 ce4 qi4

sentences.english: The AWACS detection effectiveness cruising along racetrack is researched.
sentences.chinese: 对预警机跑道形巡航时的探测效能问题进行了研究。

sentences.english: I'd love to send a probe in there to find out what's really going on.
sentences.chinese: 我很想送一个探测器去那里，看看到底发生了什么。

sentences.english: A new optical system for infrared two-color detector was designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计了适于红外双色探测器的光学系统。

sentences.english: It is useful to use greater value of detection angle for increasing the backscattering coefficient and ameliorating the ratio of signal to noise.
sentences.chinese: 可以利用大的探测角值提高背散射率以改善信噪比。

sentences.english: Thus, network issues are supposed to be detected and pro-actively addressed.
sentences.chinese: 因此，网络故障将会被探测并预先解决。

sentences.english: All four infrared detectors aboard WISE were used to make this image.
sentences.chinese: 船上所有四个红外探测器被用来获得这一图片。

sentences.english: Excellent repeatability thanks to its dyn AMIc probing system with constant measuring force.
sentences.chinese: 由动态探测系统和恒定的测量力决定了极好的重复性。

sentences.english: Now the temperature is adjusted on which the infrared-detector responsed.
sentences.chinese: 现在温度调整上的红外探测器Responsed。

sentences.english: The invention discloses an ultra-thin silica-based particle detector and a preparation method thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种超薄硅基粒子探测器及其制备方法。

sentences.english: X-ray photography used to fathom such mysteries as honeybee navigation.
sentences.chinese: 用来探测像蜜蜂飞行导向这类奥秘的x光照相术。

sentences.english: Since 2001, planet-hunters have added two more techniques to their toolbox.
sentences.chinese: 2001年后，行星探测者们又多了两个工具。

sentences.english: The aircraft uses the Foxhunter multi-mode air-intercept radar to detect and target hostile aircraft.
sentences.chinese: 该机采用福克斯特多模空中拦截雷达探测和目标敌机。

sentences.english: In this paper, A method for measuring the speed of sound in air by means of a new sound wave prober was described.
sentences.chinese: 描述了用改进的声波探测器在空气中测定声速的方法。

sentences.english: He was a member of the team that worked on the voyage of Mariner Nine to Mars.
sentences.chinese: 他是水手九号火星探测器研制小组成员。

sentences.english: Electric charge may be detected qualitatively by sprinkling or blowing indicating powders.
sentences.chinese: 静电荷可以用撒布指示粉剂的方法，予以探测。

sentences.english: Probing of overloaded and polymorphic functions is not supported.
sentences.chinese: 不支持探测重载和多态的函数。

definition: to examine/to probe/to scout out/to nose around
to follow a trail/to trace/to pursue
to monitor/to keep a close watch over/surveillance
to shoot (a projectile)/to fire (a rocket)/to launch/to emit (a particle)/to discharge/emanation/emission
